title: Forbes ranking of the 10 richest people in Italy 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Wealth in billion U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Month Leonardo Del Vecchio has the highest Wealth in billion U.S. dollars and Ennio Doris has the lowest Wealth in billion U.S. dollars.
There is a difference of 21.1 between the maximum Month Leonardo Del Vecchio and minimum Month Ennio Doris.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Wealth in billion U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Wealth in billion U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Month Leonardo Del Vecchio and lowest at Month Ennio Doris.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Wealth in billion U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Month Leonardo Del Vecchio has the highest Wealth in billion U.S. dollars and Ennio Doris has the lowest Wealth in billion U.S. dollars.
There is a difference of 21.1 between the maximum Month Leonardo Del Vecchio and minimum Month Ennio Doris.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Wealth in billion U.S. dollars in each Month on the y axis.
The Wealth in billion U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Month Leonardo Del Vecchio and lowest at Month Ennio Doris.
The difference of Wealth in billion U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Month is 21.1.
Month Leonardo Del Vecchio is higher than any other Months with value 24.4, followed by Giovanni Ferrero, and Giorgio Armani. Down to Month Ennio Doris with the lowest value 3.3.
Overall Wealth in billion U.S. dollars has reduced over the Months.
The highest value 24.4 at Leonardo Del Vecchio is almost 2.43 times larger than the average value 10.03.
The Wealth in billion U.S. dollars is 100.3 if we add up values of all Months.
